I think the crawl ratio is 1:1 for threads and domains. So if your
down to =
the last domain, then there is only one thread working on it.

This has to =
do with maintaining the load being placed on the target
domain by the crawl=
er.

Most likely your last domain is the slowest. Slowed down by slow
respo=
nse times. So it's just going to take a while for it to finish.

--- In arc=
